questions.question: The method of least square estimation involves:

answers.b: minimizing the absolute sum of errors
answers.c: minimizing the sum of squares of errors

answers.a: it is the difference between actual value and predicted value
answers.b: it is the difference between modal observation and predicted value
answers.c: difference between average value and the predicted value

questions.question: The assumption for ordinary least square is that:

answers.a: there are no measurement error associated with explainatory variable
answers.b: there are no measurement error associated with regressor variable
